thread.title_full: Russia tourism chief wants cosmodrome to be travel siteTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Russia tourism chief wants cosmodrome to be travel siteTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Russia tourism chief wants cosmodrome to be travel site Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
Russian Federal Agency chief for Tourism (Rostourism) Oleg Safonov has come up with the idea of turning the Vostochny cosmodrome into a tourist facility.
“The cosmodrome is a unique facility, such facilities can be counted on the fingers of one hand, they should be used in the tourism industry,” the Russian tourism agency’s head said
“A tourist facility may be created on the basis of the Vostochny spaceport, which will be accessible for foreign tourists as well,” Safonov said at a round-table discussion at the Eastern Economic Forum in Vladivostok.
“The cosmodrome is a unique facility, such facilities can be counted on the fingers of one hand, they should be used in the tourism industry for optimum utility,” the Rostourism head said.
